diff_hunk:
@@ -46,7 +47,7 @@ IF EXIST C:\\Jenkins\\Miniconda3 ( rd /s /q C:\\Jenkins\\Miniconda3 )
 curl https://repo.continuum.io/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Windows-x86_64.exe -O
 .\Miniconda3-latest-Windows-x86_64.exe /InstallationType=JustMe /RegisterPython=0 /S /AddToPath=0 /D=C:\\Jenkins\\Miniconda3
 call C:\\Jenkins\\Miniconda3\\Scripts\\activate.bat C:\\Jenkins\\Miniconda3
-call conda install -y -q numpy mkl cffi pyyaml boto3
body: This is unnecessary because mkl is installed using the `.7z` from s3. And the conda mkl on windows is missing necessary files for us to statically link to, so it won't be used anyways.
